remarks: The identity in a subcategory is the same as the original category. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
subccat.1 $e |- D = ( C |`cat J ) $.
subccat.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( Subcat ` C ) ) $.
subccatid.1 $e |- ( ph -> J Fn ( S X. S ) ) $.
subccatid.2 $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
subcid.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
subcid $p |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) = ( ( Id ` D ) ` X ) ) $.
